It's a charming film that explores the inspiration behind Peter Pan, and it features an all-star cast including Johnny Depp and Kate Winslet. You'll get a unique glimpse into the creative process of J.M. Barrie and his connection to the iconic character.

If you're in the mood for something more light-hearted and action-packed, "Peter Pan" (1904) might be up your alley! This classic film brings the beloved tale to life with stunning visuals and memorable characters.

With cameos from iconic filmmakers like Federico Fellini and Jeanne Moreau, this movie is sure to delight any Peter Parker fan.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something more suspenseful and mysterious, "Smilla's Sense of Snow" could be an excellent choice! This critically acclaimed thriller follows Smilla Jaspersen as she unravels the mystery behind a young boy's death, taking her on a thrilling journey across Greenland.
